overview: Street Anarchy returns with another action-packed presentation, this time around smuggling a band of hard-core mixed martial arts warriors into Tijuana, Mexico, where a group of badass local fighters await to show them who's really the best. Grab the popcorn and strap in for seven high-energy, ultra-extreme matches full of bone-crushing, blood-spurting, eye-gouging thrills.
title: MMA Hardcore
